fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Visit a player at night. do nothing to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You win with the Town until you visit or are visited by the Umbrae.
If you are visited by a member of the Umbrae or visit one yourself, become a random Umbrae role.
Spawns in a Random Town slot, may not spawn in an Umbra slot.
Does not attend the nightly umbrae meeting until they are converted.
